      • intToLsb

        public static byte[] intToLsb(int value)
        Convert int to byte array (LSB).
        Parameters:
        value - the value to convert
        Returns:
        4-byte byte array

      • intToLsb

        public static void intToLsb(int value,
            byte[] a,
            int offset)
        Convert an int value to a byte array. The conversion is placed in byte array a at offset offset. The value is represent in the byte array using LSB first.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to convert
        a - the byte array to store the converted value
        offset - the offset in a

      • lsbToInt

        public static int lsbToInt(byte[] a,
           int offset)
        Convert a 4-byte value from a byte array into an int value. The 4-byte value is assumed to be stored LSB first in the byte array.
        Parameters:
        a - the byte array containing the value to convert
        offset - the offset in the byte array
        Returns:
        a Java int
